description:
Questions to consider:

  • Are you suffering from having low energy?
  • Do you feel tired or exhausted all the time?
  • Do you feel bloated after you eat?
  • Do you have an irregular digestive system?
  • Are you looking to feel great and potentially lose weight?


If you answered yes to any of these questions then I have created the solution for you!

What is gluten? And why is gluten-free right for me?

Gluten is a protein found the grains; wheat, rye and barley. It is complex and can actually attack your body. Eating gluten free can help repair the damage done to your intestines by gluten. Even if you don't think you have an intolerance, sensitivity or celiacs disease eating gluten free can help you gain energy, regulate digestion and even lose weight!


What is celiacs disease? Could I have it?

Celiacs disease is an rare auto immune disorder that affect about 1% of the population. People with Celiacs lack the enzyme that breaks down the protein gluten and therefore cannot digest wheat, rye or barley. The only way to truly find out if you have Celiacs is to get a blood test from your doctor.

How will this course help me?

In this course you will learn how to:

  1. Identify gluten in the foods that you're currently eating.
  2. Find great gluten free alternatives to foods that you love.
    1. And most importantly....
  3. COOK!

This is a cooking course!

In the introduction to this course we will cover what gluten is and how to identify it, but the majority of the learning here will be in the kitchen. We will cover very basic recipes that will help you on your journey toward a gluten free lifestyle. These recipes are not only designed to help you eat gluten free but also save time and money in the kitchen. Each recipe will have an instructional video along with printable recipe sheets. There will also be weekly recipe updates! So be on the look out for tons of new content.

What if I need help cooking, but aren't interested in being gluten-free?

This course is STILL for YOU!! Even if you don't need a gluten free lifestyle or if you aren't one of the people affected by gluten intolerance/sensitivity we will still be learning a ton of great kitchen hacks and techniques to make you a better more efficient cook. At the end of this course you will have learned to explore your palate and your kitchen making it easy for you to impress your loved ones with your newly found cooking prowess.

Unsure if gluten free is for you?

Buy this course and take if for a test drive, if after 30 days you're still not convinced then no sweat! This course comes with a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

If you are READY to start mastering your kitchen skills AND jump into a new lifestyle that can increase your energy, regulate your digestion and help you lose weight then click "TAKE THIS COURSE" and lets get started!

I can't wait to cook with you,

--Leandra Trydal
title: Gluten Free Cooking For A Healthier YOU!
